mapper.sql: CATEGORY.ID CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY.VALUE CATEGORY_VALUE, CATEGORY.NAME CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY.RANK CATEGORY_RANK, CATEGORY.LAST_MODIFY_TIME CATEGORY_LASTMODIFYTIME, CATEGORY.CREATE_TIME CATEGORY_CREATETIME, CATEGORY.ENABLED CATEGORY_ENABLED, CATEGORY.DELETED CATEGORY_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into CATEGORY
VALUE,
NAME,
RANK,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update CATEGORY
VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from CATEGORY where DELETED = 0

SELECT
from CATEGORY where CATEGORY.DELETED = 0 and CATEGORY.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
